version_description: Preparatory works for the next big update.

- Optimised for iOS 8
- Crash bug fix for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 plus
- Other minor improvements

Thank you all for your positive reviews and suggestions. We've analyzed them and baked new the version.

- Torch brightness and strobe frequency control is now isolated from each other
- In color mode, color dashboard has been added for more options
- Minor bug fixes

P.S. Don't forget to leave us positive review :)

Issue regarding white screen absence has been solved

Thank you all for your positive reviews and suggestions. We've analyzed them and baked new version.

- Torch brightness and strobe frequency control is now isolated from each other
- In color mode, color dashboard has been added for more options
- Minor bug fixes

P.S. Don't forget to leave us positive review :)

Big update with lots of new features is here!
- Totally redesigned GUI
- New and vivid Skins
- Gesture driven On/Off switcher added
- Full Screen Compass added

Huge update with lots of new features is here!
- Totally redesigned GUI
- New and vivid Skins
- Gesture driven On/Off switcher
- Full Screen Compass added

- Issue regarding auto lock is resolved
- Minor bug fix
- Performance improvements

- Parallax effect added on Candle Fire
- Performance improvements
- Minor bug fixes

- You should see the Disco mode, so much fun..
- Bug fixes - works fast, bright and handy

P.S. Please rate us on App Store if you like our app.

-Add support for iPhone X
-Minor bug fixes - works fast

- Increased brightness level
- Added Flashlight widget
Better privacy controls for ad networks
